asgn1SoccerCompetition

Interface SportsTeam

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SoccerTeam

    public interface SportsTeam
    A general purpose interface to model a sporting team.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Alan Woodley

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void displayTeamDetails()
      Displays a String that provides details about the team.
      java.lang.String getFormString()
      Returns a string representing the recent results of the team.
      void playMatch(int pointsFor, int pointsAgainst)
      Plays a match for a team.
      void resetStats()
      Resets the teams values to their original values.

    • Method Detail

      • displayTeamDetails

        void displayTeamDetails()
        Displays a String that provides details about the team.

      • getFormString

        java.lang.String getFormString()
        Returns a string representing the recent results of the team.
        Returns:
        A string representing the recent results of the team.

      • playMatch

        void playMatch(int pointsFor,
               int pointsAgainst)
        throws TeamException
        Plays a match for a team.
        Parameters:
        pointsFor - The number of points scored by the team.
        pointsAgainst - The number of points conceded by the team.
        Throws:
        TeamException - If the number of points is unrealistic .

      • resetStats

        void resetStats()
        Resets the teams values to their original values.
